= R Installation Guide =

= Windows =
 # Download the latest installer for Windows from [http://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/ CRAN].
 # Install R by following the instructions of the installer.
[https://code.google.com/p/rimagebook/wiki/EBImageInstallation#Windows Go to EBImage installation].

= Linux =
 # Launch Terminal and install R with the following commands.
{{{
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install r-base-dev
}}}
[https://code.google.com/p/rimagebook/wiki/EBImageInstallation#Linux Go to EBImage installation].
